recommend(String, int) - Method in class CocktailRecommender
 
recommend(String, int) - Method in interface ICocktailRecommender
Return the recommended cocktail recipe to users based on users' options: Option 1: Recommend by classic Option 2: Recommend by popularity Option 3: Recommend by preference Option 4: Recommend by preference and popularity
recommendByClassic() - Method in class CocktailRecommender
 
recommendByClassic() - Method in interface ICocktailRecommender
Recommend classic cocktails to users, and return the name of the recommended drink.
recommendByDijkstra(int, int) - Method in class CocktailRecommender
 
recommendByDijkstra(int, int) - Method in interface ICocktailRecommender
Recommend cocktails by using Dijkstra based on constructed graph, and return a list of vertices which represent the shortest path.
recommendByPopularity() - Method in class CocktailRecommender
 
recommendByPopularity() - Method in interface ICocktailRecommender
Recommend cocktails with top query counts in the popularity map to users, and return the name of the recommended drink.
recommendByPreference(String) - Method in class CocktailRecommender
 
recommendByPreference(String) - Method in interface ICocktailRecommender
Recommend cocktails with the users' preferred taste in the preference map to users, and return the name of the recommended drink.
RecommenderApplication - Class in <Unnamed>
The application class to boot the cocktail recommender, accept user input, and output txt files.
